text: Donald Holst "Don" Clausen (April 27, 1923 â€“ February 7, 2015) is a former U.S. Representative from California. He served in the office for twenty years from 1963 through 1983. Clausen was a member of the Republican Party. Clausen died on January 7, 2015 in Fortuna, California, aged 91. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:United States representatives from California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Donald H. Clausen
